title: Teen shot after gun accidentally discharges, investigators say
content:
LAKE WORTH, Fla. —
The Palm Beach County Sheriff's Office is investigating a shooting that involved two teens.
Investigators said the Two 17-year-olds were checking out what they thought was an unloaded gun, when it accidentally discharged. This incident happened on Mee Court in Lake Worth.
One of the teens was shot in the upper right shoulder.
He was taken to the hospital for treatment.
Officials say everyone involved is cooperating.
